name: Convertible Wop
description: Convertible Wop transports players into a world of fast cars and even faster cities. Convertible Wop allows players into a world that combines Gucci Manes love for cars with his love for art. Creative paint jobs, eccentric cities and Gucci's chart topping tunes set the backdrop for this exciting game that takes over your senses. This fast paced game is set to be our largest scale release to date.
